mapper.select: SELECT seq, terms_no, terms_title, terms_essential, terms_reg_date FROM tb_terms
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_terms(terms_no, terms_title, terms_essential, terms_contents, terms_reg_date) VALUES(#{terms_no}, #{terms_title}, #{terms_essential}, #{terms_contents}, current_date)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_terms SET terms_no=#{terms_no}, terms_title=#{terms_title}, terms_essential=#{terms_essential}, terms_contents=#{terms_contents}, terms_reg_date=#{terms_reg_date} WHERE seq=#{seq}
